text: I like the looks of this.
text_simple: i like the looks of this

text: Ha ha, you thought me gone, did you not?
text_simple: ha ha you thought me gone did you not

text: Last of my kind but first in this.

name: jugg_rival_01
text: It's not the size of the sword, Sven, it's how you use it.
text_simple: its not the size of the sword sven its how you use it

name: jugg_rival_02
text: Size means nothing when your blade carries no weight.
text_simple: size means nothing when your blade carries no weight

name: jugg_rival_03
text: I will fit you for your deathmask now.
text_simple: i will fit you for your deathmask now

name: jugg_rival_04
text: An honorable foe stands to fight before he dies.
text_simple: an honorable foe stands to fight before he dies

name: jugg_rival_05
text: Did you think with all of your jumping you could elude me?
text_simple: did you think with all of your jumping you could elude me

name: jugg_rival_06
text: Your bubble deserved to be popped.
text_simple: your bubble deserved to be popped

name: jugg_rival_07
text: Now you are truly a spirit.
text_simple: now you are truly a spirit

name: jugg_rival_08
text: One strike against the throne of bone.
text_simple: one strike against the throne of bone

name: jugg_rival_09
text: You brought a rock to a sword fight.
text_simple: you brought a rock to a sword fight

name: jugg_rival_10
text: Through all of your snares, Blade Fury cuts like silk.
text_simple: through all of your snares blade fury cuts like silk

name: jugg_rival_11
text: You are not the king of me.
text_simple: you are not the king of me

name: jugg_rival_12
text: Hide all you like, my fury calls you out!
text_simple: hide all you like my fury calls you out

name: jugg_rival_13
text: The dragon hid behind a shield and still it did not save him.
text_simple: the dragon hid behind a shield and still it did not save him

name: jugg_scepter_03
text: Ah, Scepter, relic of a fallen race.
text_simple: ah scepter relic of a fallen race

name: jugg_taunt_03
text: I stand alone but at least I stand.
text_simple: i stand alone but at least i stand

name: jugg_view_defeat_02
text: Let's not dwell on that affair.
text_simple: lets not dwell on that affair
